ref: 13186a *samayujya -- ʻ comrade of equal age or standing ʼ. [Cf. yújya -- ʻ related ʼ, m. ʻ comrade ʼ, sayúj -- m. ʻ id. ʼ RV., sayujya -- ʻ closely connected ʼ MW., saṁyuj -- ʻ related ʼ MBh., m. ʻ relative ʼ Śiś. -- samá -- 1, yújya -- Add.]
Ku. saũjaṛyā, saũjalī, ˚lyā ʻ of equal age ʼ (rather than < sayujya -- which would not account for nasalization).
